content: does the ig-pub us templating to create narratives? I ask because if it does I'd like to propose update the capstatements one to use my narrative template. mine is in jinja2 for Python but they all are pretty much the same and I can probably convert to whatever templating is used.
this is not a feature of the template, but the IG publisher directly
the IG Publisher uses liquid template for this
Yes so I would like to rewrite the liquid template for capstatement
